A server-side interface for client.

    • Player

      public Player​(java.net.Socket socket, java.lang.String name, java.awt.Color color)
      Creates Player - server-side interface for client.
      Parameters:
      socket - connection socket
      name - custom player's name
      color - basic player's identifier - color of their pegs

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • setup

      private void setup() throws java.io.IOException
      Setups I/O features for player, sends them a welcome message and expected number of players, sends messages when it's the player's move, waits for players if necessary.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown in case of I/O initilaization failure

    • processSelectCommand

      private void processSelectCommand​(int begI, int begJ)
      Checks if the Select is correct, delegating the command further .
      Parameters:
      begI - position X of a Peg on the Board
      begJ - position Y of a Peg on the Board
      See Also:
      SelectionRule

    • processMoveCommand

      private void processMoveCommand​(int begI, int begJ, int endI, int endJ)
      Checks if the move is correct, delegating the command further, if is sends a message to client to move the peg on its Board. If the move was correct, checks if all of Pegs are in the base to provide victory, sends a message if true.
      Parameters:
      begI - position X of a Peg on the Board
      begJ - position Y of a Peg on the Board
      endI - target position X on the Board
      endJ - target position Y on the Board
      See Also:
      MovingRule

    • processEndTurnCommand

      private void processEndTurnCommand()
      Ends the turn of current player, sets next player as a current player, sends a message.
